InstructionData.Title: SorterScriptOreIngot

InstructionData.Instructions:
#Ingots define CopperIngot -404336834 #Copper 1 define GoldIngot 226410516 #Gold 2 define IronIngot -1301215609 #Iron 3 define LeadIngot 2134647745 #Lead 4 define NickelIngot -1406385572 #Nickel 5 define SiliconIngot -290196476 #Silicon 6 define SilverIngot -929742000 #Silver 7 define ConstantanIngot 1058547521 #Constantan 8 define ElectrumIngot 502280180 #Electrum 9 define InvarIngot -297990285 #Invar 10 define SolderIngot -82508479 #Solder 11 define SteelIngot -654790771 #Steel 12 define AstroloyIngot 412924554 #Astroloy 13 define HastelloyIngot 1579842814 #Hastelloy 14 define InconelIngot -787796599 #Inconel 15 define StelliteIngot -1897868623 #Stellite 16 define WaspaloyIngot 156348098 #Waspaloy 17 #Ore define BiomassOre -831480639 define Charcoal 252561409 define Coal 1724793494 define CobaltOre -983091249 define CopperOre -707307845 define GoldOre -1348105509 define IronOre 1758427767 define LeadOre -190236170 define NickelOre 1830218956 define Reagentmix -1641500434 define SiliconOre 1103972403 define SilverOre -916518678 define UraniumOre -1516581844 #Ice define Water 1217489948 define Nitrice -1499471529 define Oxite -1805394113 define Volatiles 1253102035
alias Sorter d0 alias HashValue r0 alias SorterOutput r5 #Init s Sorter Mode 2 s Sorter Output -1 Main:
ls HashValue Sorter 0 OccupantHash beq HashValue 0 Main #User defined code start beq HashValue SteelIngot Wanted #Wanted option 2 #Wanted option 3 #Wanted option n #User defined code end s Sorter Output 0 j Loop
Wanted: s Sorter Output 1
Loop: l SorterOutput Sorter Output beq SorterOutput -1 Main j Loop j Main
